lines.text: Expensive Things! Luxury positioning. I learned about this at Wharton. Well, I read about Wharton. In a dumpster behind Wharton.
In the luxury market, scarcity creates value. Like hot dogs with business degrees.
The key to expensive Things is confidence. Act like your Thing is worth $50. Because it is. We decided that.
Marketing is crucial for expensive Things. You're not selling a Thing, you're selling a lifestyle. A Thing lifestyle.
You know what's expensive? Wharton tuition. You know what's also expensive? Your Things. One of these I can actually afford.
The luxury market is all about exclusivity. Only the finest customers for the finest Things. I feel fancy just saying that.
For expensive Things, marketing isn't a costâ€”it's an investment in perceived value. Your mother would understand. She's very perceptive.
